dmca.title: No Work Product For You
dmca.body:
Dear [private]:

We represent NewsMax Media, Inc. and its President and Chief Executive Officer, [private]. It has come to our attention that a site entitled "Sample Contracts and Business Forms" has included verbatim, the employment agreement which our client entered into with its Chief Executive Officer, dated August 23, 2001. No permission has ever been obtained to publish this contact as a sample contract and business form for your subscribers.

To publish the contract verbatim, without written permission, amounts to a copyright infringement. We hereby request that you immediately remove from your website and any other publications in which you have included it, the above mentioned employment contract.

Sincerey,

[private]
